00029 #ifndef ABSTRACTTIMEADAPTIVITYCONTROLLER_HPP_
00030 #define ABSTRACTTIMEADAPTIVITYCONTROLLER_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "PetscVecTools.hpp"
00033 
00038 class AbstractTimeAdaptivityController
00039 {
00040 private:
00042     double mMinimumTimeStep;
00044     double mMaximumTimeStep;
00051     virtual double ComputeTimeStep(double currentTime, Vec currentSolution)=0;
00052 
00053 public:
00059     AbstractTimeAdaptivityController(double minimumTimeStep, double maximumTimeStep)
00060         : mMinimumTimeStep(minimumTimeStep),
00061           mMaximumTimeStep(maximumTimeStep)
00062     {
00063         assert(minimumTimeStep>0.0);
00064         assert(maximumTimeStep>0.0);
00065         assert(minimumTimeStep < maximumTimeStep);
00066     }
00067     
00069     virtual ~AbstractTimeAdaptivityController()
00070     {
00071     }
00072 
00077     double GetNextTimeStep(double currentTime, Vec currentSolution)
00078     {
00079         double dt = ComputeTimeStep(currentTime, currentSolution);
00080         if(dt < mMinimumTimeStep)
00081         {
00082             dt = mMinimumTimeStep;
00083         }
00084         if(dt > mMaximumTimeStep)
00085         {
00086             dt = mMaximumTimeStep;
00087         }
00088         return dt;
00089     }
00090 };
00091 
00092 
00093 #endif /*ABSTRACTTIMEADAPTIVITYCONTROLLER_HPP_*/
